    • Uses of Reward in info.interactivesystems.gamificationengine.entities.rewards

      Subclasses of Reward in info.interactivesystems.gamificationengine.entities.rewards 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Achievement
      The achievement class contains an image and a description for a documentary use to track significant results or milestones the player was able to achieve during her/his play.
      class  Badge
      The badge class serves as a Reward-subclass that represents a distinct icon.
      class  Coins
      The Coins class serves as a Reward-subclass, that allocates coins to a player.
      class  PermanentReward
      Permanent rewards are rewards that can be earned only once.
      class  Points
      Points class serves as a Reward-subclass, that allocates points to a player.
      class  ReceiveLevel
      The ReceiveLevel class is a Reward-subclass that allocates a specific level to a player which can serve as a status.
      class  VolatileReward
      A volatile reward is a reward that can be awarded more than one time.
